page.title: 19Education E.K.
page.content: The education in East Kilbride is very thorough with six primary schools and two high schools in our 'D' block. There is never far to walk to school, and with the under passes and so on there is a high level of safety. Just now all over the country teachers are in protest over their pay which is too small. There are several nurseries which cater for 3_5 year olds.Then they go to primary school till they are twelve .At this stage they have High school which they attend till they are 16 or 17 years of age.After this stage they may take further education in college or university _although these are not compulsory . In primary the main mathematics is Scottish Primary Mathematics Group and in High School there are modules. Most people like school.
